name: Refrigerator Toshiba GR-RF610WE-PMS(37) Satin
origAbout: The 1st Japanese Quality 3-System of OriginFRESH™ multi-door Dual Inverter Refrigerator. Not only this fridge keep food in its original state of freshness for longer, but it also transforms by expanding right spaces when you need it. TOSHIBA Dual Cooling system control temp in fridges and freezers independently, makes accurate temperature control and no smells mixing. Pure Bio with plasma module produces ions which can neutralize odors and kill the smell bacteria. Keep original taste of food. Plasma module doesn't need to change compared with traditional net carbon. Convenient and durable.

details.name: Freezing Power Capacity (kg/day), kilogram per day
